# How to Find and Install the Best Windows 10 Store Apps
 
Windows 10 Store apps are applications that you can download and install from the Microsoft Store on your PC or tablet. They offer a variety of benefits, such as being easy to update, secure, and compatible with different devices. However, with thousands of apps available, how do you find and install the best ones for your needs? In this article, we will show you some tips and tricks to help you discover and enjoy the best Windows 10 Store apps.
 
## crack windows 10 store apps


[**Download**](https://vercupalo.blogspot.com/?d=2tKyD4)

 
## How to Find the Best Windows 10 Store Apps
 
One of the easiest ways to find the best Windows 10 Store apps is to browse the categories and collections on the Microsoft Store. You can access the Microsoft Store by clicking on the shopping bag icon on your taskbar, or by searching for "store" in the Start menu. Once you open the store, you will see different categories of apps, such as games, entertainment, productivity, education, and more. You can also see featured collections of apps curated by Microsoft, such as "Best of 2023", "Essential Apps", or "Staff Picks". You can click on any category or collection to see more details and reviews of the apps.
 
Another way to find the best Windows 10 Store apps is to use the search function on the Microsoft Store. You can type in any keyword or phrase related to the app you are looking for, such as "photo editor", "weather", or "fitness". You can then filter the results by price, rating, category, or device compatibility. You can also sort the results by relevance, popularity, or date. This way, you can find the most suitable app for your specific needs and preferences.
 
## How to Install the Best Windows 10 Store Apps
 
Once you have found the app you want to install, you can simply click on the "Get" or "Install" button on its page on the Microsoft Store. You may need to sign in with your Microsoft account if you haven't already. Some apps may be free, while others may require a one-time purchase or a subscription. You can also see the app's size, rating, description, screenshots, and system requirements before installing it.
 
After you click on the "Get" or "Install" button, the app will start downloading and installing on your device. You can see the progress of the installation on the Microsoft Store or on your taskbar. Once the app is installed, you can launch it from the Start menu or by clicking on its icon on your taskbar. You can also pin it to your Start menu or taskbar for easy access.
 
## How to Manage and Update Your Windows 10 Store Apps
 
One of the advantages of Windows 10 Store apps is that they are easy to manage and update. You can see all your installed apps by going to Settings > Apps > Apps & features. Here you can uninstall any app you don't want anymore by clicking on it and selecting "Uninstall". You can also move an app to another drive or reset its data by clicking on it and selecting "Advanced options".
 
To update your Windows 10 Store apps, you can go to Microsoft Store > ... > Downloads and updates. Here you can see all your pending and completed updates for your apps. You can also check for updates manually by clicking on "Get updates". Alternatively, you can enable automatic updates for your apps by going to Settings > Apps > Apps & features > App updates. Here you can turn on "Update apps automatically" to ensure that your apps are always up to date.
 
## Conclusion
 
Windows 10 Store apps are a great way to enhance your PC or tablet experience with a variety of features and functions. You can find and install the best Windows 10 Store apps by browsing the categories and collections on the Microsoft Store or by using the search function. You can also easily manage and update your apps by using the Settings app or the Microsoft Store app. We hope this article has helped you discover and enjoy some of the best Windows 10 Store apps available.
